UK Trade Tariff 9503 00 21 90

  1. Section XX Miscellaneous manufactured articles

    1. 95 Toys, games and sports requisites; parts and accessories thereof

      1. 03 Tricycles, scooters, pedal cars and similar wheeled toys; dolls' carriages; dolls; other toys; reduced-size (scale) models and similar recreational models, working or not; puzzles of all kinds

        1. 00 Dolls representing only human beings and parts and accessories thereof

          1. 21 Dolls

            1. 90 Other

Start again
  1. Overview
  2. Import
  3. Export
  4. Footnotes

Overview

Import

Importing from outside the EU is subject to a third country duty of 4.70%. Goods are also subject to VAT standard rate of 20%.

Imports are subject to Import control on cat and dog fur.

Export

There are no EU third country measures for this commodity. There are no VAT or Exise measures for this commodity.

See import and export tables for country-specific measures and restrictions.

This tariff applies today (21/5/2012)

Change date
